text: Julian Christopher (born November 7, 1944) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles in various films and television series from the 1970s to the present, including The Magician, with Bill Bixby. His most notable appearances were in Cool Breeze, X-Men: The Last Stand, Elysium and 88 Minutes. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
